title: Calories in 10 Chicken Nuggets
meta_description: Discover calories in 10 pc chicken nuggets, including protein, fat, carbs, sodium details, and simple tweaks for healthier options.
assumptions: Standard breaded, frozen chicken nuggets, deep-fried, average size ~20 g each, no dipping sauce.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, breading, cooking method, and added ingredients. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 10 chicken nuggets provide ~500 kcal and ~40 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken nugget?
faqs.a: About 50 kcal per standard breaded, fried chicken nugget.

faqs.q: What is the protein in 10 pc chicken nuggets?
Are chicken nuggets high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 10 pieces have ~1000 mg sodium due to breading and seasoning.

faqs.q: How does baking affect calories in chicken nuggets?
faqs.a: Baking reduces calories by ~15 kcal per nugget compared to frying.

faqs.q: Do chicken nuggets have trans fats?
faqs.a: Small amounts, about 1 g total for 10 pieces from frying oils.
